summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the drainage and wastewater system of The City of Seattle, Washington; adopting a system or plan of additions and betterments to and extensions of the drainage and wastewater system; authorizing the issuance and sale of drainage and wastewater revenue bonds for the purposes of paying part of the cost of carrying out that system or plan and providing a reserve for and paying the costs of issuing and selling those bonds; describing the terms, conditions, covenants, lien and manner of sale of those bonds; and creating certain accounts of the City.
